org.apache.coyote.http11

类 Http11InputBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.coyote.http11.Http11InputBuffer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    InputBuffer, ApplicationBufferHandler

    public class Http11InputBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputBuffer, ApplicationBufferHandler
    InputBuffer for HTTP that provides request header parsing as well as transfer encoding.

    • 方法详细资料

      • doRead

        public int doRead(ApplicationBufferHandler handler)
           throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: InputBuffer
        Read from the input stream into the ByteBuffer provided by the ApplicationBufferHandler. IMPORTANT: the current model assumes that the protocol will 'own' the ByteBuffer and return a pointer to it.
        指定者:
        doRead 在接口中 InputBuffer
        参数:
        handler - ApplicationBufferHandler that provides the buffer to read data into.
        返回:
        The number of bytes that have been added to the buffer or -1 for end of stream
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs reading from the input stream

      • setByteBuffer

        public void setByteBuffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        指定者:
        setByteBuffer 在接口中 ApplicationBufferHandler

      • getByteBuffer

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer getByteBuffer()
        指定者:

      • expand

        public void expand(int size)
        指定者:
        expand 在接口中 ApplicationBufferHandler
